column2:
"Happy Halloween! Wooo!
...Hmm. No, maybe something else...
I'm a ghost! I'm going to eat you!"
"Oh, sorry. I've been put in charge of the ghost at this year's Halloween event, so I was practicing for it."

"I just can't get my head around what it should be like...
I need something pale with glowing red eyes that flies around to refer to."
"You know enemies like that? You're a lifesaver! Please! Tell me more about them!"
